dict.acceptation: 船；<口>宇宙飞船；（舰船上的）全体船员；运气；
把…装上船；装好（船具）；上市；使乘船；
在船上工作；乘船旅行；当船员；

sent.orig: MEHTODS: By immunohistochemistry, SHIP expression was examined in the tissue membrane, alveolar bone, permanent tooth germ.
sent.trans: 方法：应用免疫组织化学的方法检测SHIP在犬乳恒牙替换期组织中的表达。

sent.orig: RESULTS: SHIP positive signals were observed in the osteoclasts, odentoclasts and enamel of permanent tooth germ.
sent.trans: 结果：SHIP在破骨细胞、破牙细胞和恒牙胚釉质层表达阳性。

sent.orig: There is a simple beauty in ship, shop, walk, free, earth, mate, man, fried.
